attributes.action: Bring back plates for food consumption at Chellaston Academy
attributes.background: This year, meals on plates have been replaced with tubs containing a portion size that would be considered small even in the rationing era. We demand the return of plates, full English choices and proper meals

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the school, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this with the school's senior management and/or the governing body.
